articles.author: Chris Jennings
articles.title: Today's mortgage rates see minor uptick | December 7, 2020 - Fox Business
articles.description: Check out the mortgage rates for December 7, 2020, which are mostly up from yesterday.
articles.content:
Based on data compiled by Credible Operations, Inc., NMLS Number 1681276, mortgage rates have mostly risen since last Friday.
<ul><li>30-year fixed-rate mortgages: 2.625%, Up from 2.500%, +0.125</li… [+5118 chars]

articles.author: Paul A. Eisenstein
articles.title: Ford to delay launch of new Bronco as pandemic drives parts supply shortages - NBC News
articles.description: Ford will delay the launch of one of its most eagerly awaited new products, the Bronco SUV, due to the coronavirus pandemic, the automaker announced.
articles.content:
Ford will delay until next summer the launch of one of its most eagerly awaited new products, the Bronco SUV, due to the coronavirus pandemic, the automaker announced.

articles.title: MGM Inks Cloud Computing Deal With Amazon in Search for "New Revenue Opportunities" - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The James Bond studio is set to move all of its content to Amazon's cloud and use the tech giant's software to modernize its media supply chain.
articles.content: Metro Goldwyn Mayer has signed a cloud computing agreement with Amazon Web Services to move its content and distribution efforts to the tech giant's cloud and to help the studio develop "new business… [+1397 chars]

articles.title: India's Serum Institute reportedly seeks emergency use for AstraZeneca's Covid vaccine - CNBC
